verses.name: Mark 14:57
verses.text: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,

verses.name: Mark 14:58
verses.text: We heard him say, I will destroy this temple that is made with hands, and within three days I will build another made without hands.

verses.name: Mark 14:59
verses.text: But neither so did their witness agree together.

verses.name: Mark 14:60
verses.text: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?

verses.name: Mark 14:61
verses.text: But he held his peace, and answered nothing. Again the high priest asked him, and said unto him, Art thou the Christ, the Son of the Blessed?
